code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/GlobalState';export var IncomeExpenses=function IncomeExpenses(){var _useContext=useContext(GlobalContext),transactions=_useContext.transactions;var amounts=transactions.map(function(transaction){return transaction.amount;});/* const total = amounts.reduce((acc, item) => (acc += item), 0).toFixed(2);*/var income=amounts.filter(function(item){return item>0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0).toFixed(2);var expense=(amounts.filter(function(item){return item<0;}).reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+=item;},0)*-1).toFixed(2);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"inc-exp-container"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Income"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money plus"},"$",income)),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h4",null,"Expense"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("p",{className:"money minus"},"$",expense)));};
